revisions.rev:
{{Infobox NFL_season | logo = | team = Jacksonville Jaguars | year = 2008 | record = 5â11 | division_place = 4th [[AFC South]] | coach = [[Jack Del Rio]] | stadium = [[Jacksonville Municipal Stadium]] | playoffs = ''did not qualify'' | pro bowlers = None | uniform = File:AFCS-2008-Uniform-JAX.PNG }} The '''2008 [[Jacksonville Jaguars]] season''' was the 14th season for the team in the [[National Football League]]. The Jaguars failed to improve upon their 11â5 record from [[2007 Jacksonville Jaguars season|2007]] and did not make the playoffs, contrary to many preseason predictions.http://sports.espn.go.com/nfl/preview08/team?team=jac {{TOC limit|limit=2}} ==Notable roster changes== ===2008 NFL Draft picks=== {{main|2008 NFL Draft}} {|class="wikitable sortable sortable" style="width: 50%" |- ! Round !! Pick # !! Overall !! Name !! Position !! College |- | 1 || 8 || 8 || [[Derrick Harvey]] || [[Defensive End]] || [[University of Florida|Florida]] |- | 2 || 21 || 52 || [[Quentin Groves]] || [[Defensive End]] || [[Auburn University|Auburn]] |- | 5 || 20 || 155 || [[Thomas Williams (American football)|Thomas Williams]] || [[Linebacker]] || [[University of Southern California|USC]] |- | 5 || 24 || 159 || [[Trae Williams]] || [[Cornerback]] || [[University of South Florida|USF]] |- | 7 || 6 || 213 || [[Chauncey Washington]] || [[Running back]] || [[university of Southern California|USC]] |} Source:{{cite web|url=http://www.theredzone.org/2008/draft/showteam.asp?Team=Jaguars|title=Jacksonville Jaguars 2008 Draft Choices|accessdate=2008-12-02}} ===Trades and free agent signings=== * WR [[Troy Williamson]] acquired via trade from the [[Minnesota Vikings]] in exchange for a 6th round pick in the 2008 NFL Draft. * WR [[Jerry Porter (American football)|Jerry Porter]] signed as a free agent from the [[Oakland Raiders]]. * CB [[Drayton Florence]] acquired as a free agent from the [[San Diego Chargers]]. * QB [[Cleo Lemon]] acquired as a free agent from the [[Miami Dolphins]]. * DT [[Marcus Stroud]] was traded to the [[Buffalo Bills]] in exchange for picks in the third and fifth round of the [[2008 NFL Draft]]. * WR [[Ernest Wilford]] left as a free agent to sign with the [[Miami Dolphins]]. * DE [[Bobby McCray]] left as a free agent to sign with the [[New Orleans Saints]]. * S [[Sammy Knight]] left as a free agent to sign with the [[New York Giants]]. ===Richard Collier shooting=== On September 2, 2008, third-year [[offensive tackle]] [[Richard Collier]] was shot outside an apartment building in Jacksonville while waiting for his girlfriend with a friend of his, former teammate [[Kenny Pettway]], in his [[Cadillac Escalade]].{{cite web|url=http://sports.espn.go.com/nfl/news/story?id=3564534|title=Jaguars' Collier critical after shooting; ex-teammate Pettway unhurt|last=Assosiated Press|date=2008|accessdate=2008-12-02}} He was shot 14 times, largely in his lower torso and upper legs. Five bullets lodged in his bladder, and two struck his spine, severing his [[spinal cord]]. He was critically wounded, and spent three weeks on a ventilator. He was left [[paraplegia|paraplegic]], as well as having his left leg [[amputation|amputated]] below the knee due to [[embolism]]s. ==Final roster== {| class="toccolours" style="text-align: left;" |-
